website_summaries.verdict: Its $150, £120 or AU$200 price tag certainly puts it in an exclusive class, but the Elite controller is one of the most customizable, comfortable and luxurious controllers we've ever used.
pros: The Elite controller is an ultra-satisfying, high-end Xbox One and PC controller that offers an impressive amount of customization on its analog sticks, D-pad and triggers, and introduces back paddles
The Xbox Elite app allows for even more personalization, including the ability to remap every button on the controller
cons: It's tough to justify that hefty price
The back paddles are very easy to hit accidentally if you're not accustomed to them
Rechargeable batteries would not have been too much to ask

customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I bought a new controller was because the right directional stick drifted upward by itself. This one out of the box drifted upward. Please dear god. Buy new. This is selling faulty controllers. Spend the extra money and buy new.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not renewed - Needed fixing out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Still had some stick drift and the rubber like grip on the right side is coming off. I will have to repair it myself soon.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Devor

customer_reviews.title: Broken D-Pad + Missing back paddle
customer_reviews.text: When my controller shipped, it came with a missing back paddle and instead had 2 of the same. Down on the D-Pad also does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan WG

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: For as expensive as this controller was it should have lasted longer than 9 months! Very disappointing. I thought if we invested in a more expensive controller we would get better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: No noticable defects on shipping like I thought there’d be. Some smudge marks, but it’s a controller and doomed to have SOME sort of grease stain on it eventually
customer_reviews.author: Tahi Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Want money back
customer_reviews.text: Want a refund and doesn’t look like there is a way. Bought a white controller and black and they both broke within less then a year.
customer_reviews.author: Guy izzo

customer_reviews.title: The reviews scared me, but the controller was fine
customer_reviews.text: The controllet I was sent was in decent condition. No major issues. It came with all the right parts. I was worried having read other reviews.

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to comfortably
customer_reviews.text: First things first THIS WILL NOT MAKE YOU IMMEDIATELY BETTER AT GAMING. But the hair triggers are good once you're used to them with my only real complaint being that they cant be uniquely hotkeyed to a new key when the controller is being used on pc

customer_reviews.text: its a great controller but it broke way too easy and way too soon, and i had a lot going on so i wasnt able to return it in time

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 y/I son loves it. I purchased online Thursday and It arrived Sat morning as noted at the time of purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Buy the new version, not worth the money saved
customer_reviews.text: Just buy the new version, couldn’t even bother to check and make sure the controller actually worked before it was sent to me. Not worth saving the money.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I experienced very fast shipping and experienced 0 of the previously mentioned issues with other reviewers. Arrived in perfect condition with all parts and everything in order and hasn’t given me a single issue.
